name: Ghostly Fruit
description:
Introduction

Ghostly Fruit is an endless runner where you play as a pig-unicorn-man trying to eat as much fruit as unicornly possible. You have to be aware that eating fruit and then dying will curse you and leave a permanent ghost that you have to defeat next time you go on an eating-adventure!

Ghosty Fruit was made during the Pursuing Pixels James Jam Game Gam
Theme: Permanence

Controls

Mouse controls are enabled by default, but keyboard and controller are also supported in the pause menu if you disable it! (Press P for pause)

- Mouse

    Aim with the Mouse, Jump with right click and Shoot with left click

- Keyboard

    Aim with the Arrow keys, Jump with Z and Shoot with X

- Controller

    Aim with the D-pad / Joystick, Jump with A and Shoot with B, Start for pause
